info.name: RoomVox
info.summary: CalDAV-native room booking via any calendar app
info.description:
**Book meeting rooms from any calendar app.** RoomVox turns your Nextcloud into a complete room booking system. Rooms appear as standard CalDAV resources — users book them directly from Nextcloud Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook, Thunderbird, or eM Client. No separate interface needed.
**Key features:** * Automatic conflict detection prevents double bookings * Auto-accept or manager approval workflow per room * Availability rules and booking horizon limits * Role-based permissions (Viewer / Booker / Manager) * Room groups with inherited permissions * Email notifications with iCalendar attachments * Per-room SMTP configuration * CSV import/export with MS365/Exchange migration support * Public REST API for displays, kiosks, and integrations * Zero database — all config stored in Nextcloud's IAppConfig
**Works with:** Nextcloud Calendar, Apple Calendar (macOS/iOS), Microsoft Outlook, Thunderbird, eM Client — with automatic compatibility fixes for client quirks.
**Requirements:** Nextcloud 32–33, PHP 8.2+
